description: This file defines validation functions for form input fields, including checks for required fields, email format, minimum length, number range (for CGPA and year), and a general validate function that applies rules to input data.

methods.name: required
methods.description: Checks if the input value is undefined, null, or an empty string after trimming, and returns an error message if so.

methods.name: email
methods.description: Validates that the input matches a standard email pattern.

methods.name: minLength
methods.description: Generates a validator that checks if the input string has at least n characters.

methods.name: numberRange
methods.description: Creates a validator that checks if a number is within specified min and max bounds.

methods.name: cgpa
methods.description: A specific numberRange validator for CGPA, between 0 and 10.

methods.name: year
methods.description: A numberRange validator for year, between 1900 and 2100.

methods.name: validate(fields, rules)
methods.description: Applies validation rules to fields and returns an object of errors.

calls: v === undefined || v === null || String(v).trim() === '' ? 'This field is required' : null

ctags.name: minLength
ctags.pattern: /^export const minLength = (n) => (v) => (v && String(v).length < n ? `Must be at least ${n} chara/

ctags.name: required
ctags.pattern: /^export const required = (v) => (v === undefined || v === null || String(v).trim() === '' ? 'This/
